Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wenthworth
ShortDescription: #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Michigan, then resume their normal route on 115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Michigan, then resume their normal route on 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Wenthworth

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Paulina due to mechanical problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Paulina due to mechanical problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
